Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: The student can draw two people standing apart, attempting to depict communication. (The representation may be rudimentary, such as simple stick figures.)
CANNOT: The student is likely unable to connect the two people with a clear string telephone. (The concept of using a string to transmit sound may not be evident.)
The student may not include any clear materials or show how the string telephone operates. (Essential components like cups might be missing or unrecognizable.)
The student might not correctly illustrate the string as being tight or stretched. (The string could appear slack, which would not transmit sound well.)
The student may not demonstrate an understanding of how sound travels through the string to facilitate communication. (The use of sound as a communication tool is likely misunderstood or absent.)
